system.description: This spell allows you to change your physical appearance, including worn and carried equipment. You can make yourself appear fatter or thinner, taller or shorter (by up to one foot), you can add or obscure features, and so on. The illusion only changes your visual appearance, it does not affect the other senses. If you wish to assume the appearance of a specific individual, this spell grants a +2 bonus to the disguise roll.
system.rank: Novice (Mage, Nightblade, Spellsinger and Deceit Sphere)
system.duration: 30 minutes per caster rank, dismiss early as a normal action
